418c5b04-a2b5-4424-8f9e-7b583ea2b23b.description: Earners of the Prosci® Certified Change Practitioner badge have the knowledge, skills, and tools to drive successful change initiatives. They can apply the Prosci Methodology and tools to create a change management strategy and plans, with the necessary commitment to enable individual change and achieve organizational results and outcomes.
418c5b04-a2b5-4424-8f9e-7b583ea2b23b.name: Prosci® Certified Change Practitioner

badge_template_activities.title: Complete the three-day Prosci Change Management Certification Program.
Apply holistic change management methodologies and tools to a real-life project.
Successfully pass a comprehensive assessment.

3cdb1a85-a5ac-4880-b2fb-0f8bbc3a3158.description: Earners of the Prosci® Leading Your Team Through Change badge have the tools, knowledge and confidence to lead a team through organizational change. They understand the impact change management has on organizational results and the critical role managers play in the change process. They can assess a change impacting their team, apply the Prosci ADKAR® Model to facilitate individual change, apply change management tools, and create plans to move employees past barriers and to desired outcomes.
3cdb1a85-a5ac-4880-b2fb-0f8bbc3a3158.name: Prosci® Leading Your Team Through Change

badge_template_activities.title: Complete the one-day Leading Your Team Through Change Workshop.
Apply the Prosci ADKAR Model to facilitate individual change and identify reasons for employee resistance; create action plans to move employees past barrier points and to the desired future state.

756d1b23-70f9-49b8-9d4c-608032b6cc1f.description: Earners of the Prosci® Taking Charge of Change badge can apply five tenets of change management to a specific project or change initiative to build awareness and desire for change management—the first two milestones in the Prosci ADKAR Model. They understand the value of change management and the connection between the technical and people side of change. They know how to diagnose and assess a change initiative, apply the ADKAR Model for individual change, and develop an action plan.
756d1b23-70f9-49b8-9d4c-608032b6cc1f.name: Prosci® Taking Charge of Change

badge_template_activities.title: Complete the one-day Taking Charge of Change Workshop.

Apply the five tenets of change to an initiative by completing a diagnostic and assessment for the initiative, applying the ADKAR Model for Individual Change, and developing a commitment-to-action plan.

f84e3cb0-1758-4ede-8177-a7ea80a4cd94.description: Earners of the Integrating Agile and Change Management badge understand how to leverage change management while migrating to an Agile framework and how combining change management and Agile can improve the adoption and usage of iteratively designed solutions. They can adapt their change management approach and align the ADKAR® Model with Agile efforts and sprints/releases. They know how to align the five organizational change management plans to Agile and identify specific adjustments for each.
f84e3cb0-1758-4ede-8177-a7ea80a4cd94.name: Prosci® Integrating Agile and Change Management

badge_template_activities.title: Complete the one-day Integrating Agile and Change Management Workshop.
Build detailed tactics and plans for adapting change management for an Agile iterative development initiative.

f8013849-3dca-4648-8460-572f1c75f58c.description: Earners of the Methodology Application Program badge know how to apply Prosci's enhanced methodology and advanced digital tools. They can assess holistic project health, evaluate a broad range of risk, and develop a role roster to identify and activate change management roles. They know how to align people-side activities and timelines to a project, build and activate an ADKAR Blueprint, and adapt change management plans. They can use Proxima, Prosci's digital tool for managing change.
f8013849-3dca-4648-8460-572f1c75f58c.name: Prosci® Methodology Application Program

badge_template_activities.title: Badge earners attend a one-day program where they learn to apply Prosci's enhanced methodology and use Prosci's advanced digital tools to achieve successful change outcomes.

bbe435bf-2bb0-494f-8a98-ffc9f94adad6.description: Earners of the Prosci® Change Management Program for Managers badge have the skills needed to address barriers to change and lead their teams to a future state with improved organizational results. They understand foundational aspects of change and can define their role in change, identify reasons for employee resistance, apply the Prosci ADKAR® Model to facilitate individual change, and create action plans to manage change.
bbe435bf-2bb0-494f-8a98-ffc9f94adad6.name: Prosci® Change Management Program for Managers

badge_template_activities.title: Complete a one-day course.
Apply change management tools and techniques within the context of a current change.

b02ba452-61f9-468e-b8b3-b1c8d6cbc9c6.description: Earners of the Prosci® Train-the-Trainer Level 1 badge are qualified to establish a world-class change management training program in their organization, improving their organization's change readiness. They are trainers who know how to develop and deliver four of Prosci's role-based training programs: Change Management Program for Managers, Fundamentals of Change Management, Delivering Projects Results Workshop, and Change Management Employee Orientation.
b02ba452-61f9-468e-b8b3-b1c8d6cbc9c6.name: Prosci® Train-the-Trainer Level 1

badge_template_activities.title: Complete an immersive education experience to learn the purpose, objectives, intended audience and structure of four of Prosci's role-based programs: Change Management Program for Managers, Fundamentals of Change Management, Delivering Projects Results Workshop, and Change Management Employee Orientation.

Practice teaching select learning modules in front of the class and instructors and receive feedback and recommendations for improving delivery. Craft a training delivery strategy to guide future implementation of change management training.

8cd56208-58a5-484e-8440-924e0da36990.description: Earners of the Prosci® Train-the-Trainer Level 2 badge are qualified to establish a world-class change management training program in their organization. They improve their organization's change readiness by elevating the organization's mindset, toolset and skillset and by developing skilled change practitioners. They are trainers who know how to develop and deliver Prosci's role-based programs including Change Management Practitioner Program and Change Management Sponsor Briefing.
8cd56208-58a5-484e-8440-924e0da36990.name: Prosci® Train-the-Trainer Level 2

badge_template_activities.title: Complete an immersive education experience to learn the purpose, objectives, intended audience and structure of two of Prosci's role-based programs: Change Management Practitioner Program and Change Management Sponsor Briefing.

Practice teaching select learning modules in front of the class and instructors and receive feedback and recommendations for improving delivery. Craft a training delivery strategy to guide future implementation of change management training.

288a00ba-5a97-4327-9cad-cfb562af88b5.description: Earners of the Prosci® Enterprise Change Management (ECM) Boot Camp can assess their organization's change management maturity across five capability areas and define a future state vision for change capability. They understand how the people side of change relates to building capability and they know best practices when applying enterprise change management. They can create an ECM strategy map and lead a change management deployment that drives competitive advantage.
288a00ba-5a97-4327-9cad-cfb562af88b5.name: Prosci® Enterprise Change Management Boot Camp

badge_template_activities.title: Complete the one-day Enterprise Change Management Boot Camp.
Create an enterprise change management strategy map.

a80ff26d-7c6a-41d6-8a63-4c164f8149f2.description: Earners of the Delivering Project Results badge increase project ROI by understanding how to integrate project management and change management. They share a common language and change framework with change management practitioners and can map change management to their projects using the Prosci® Change Management Blueprint. They know when their projects need change management and can identify impacted employee groups. They understand the connection between employee adoption and project results.
a80ff26d-7c6a-41d6-8a63-4c164f8149f2.name: Prosci® Delivering Project Results

badge_template_activities.title: Badge earners must complete the Delivering Project Results Workshop, a results-oriented learning experience for project managers and project team members that defines change management within the context of the project's intent, objectives, scope, workstreams, milestones, deliverables, and timelines. The workshop provides a common language and framework for integrating project management and change management.

1d5facf8-5633-4a2a-93c7-1bf606aaa0a3.description: Earners of the Prosci® Train-the-Trainer badge are qualified to coach, develop and mentor their entire team in-house, improving their organization's change-readiness. They are immersed in the change management teaching experience where they learn how to develop and deliver Prosci's core training programs: Change Management Practitioner, Change Management Program for Managers, Change Management Sponsor Briefing, Change Management Employee Orientation, and Delivering Project Results.
1d5facf8-5633-4a2a-93c7-1bf606aaa0a3.name: Prosci® Train-the-Trainer

badge_template_activities.title: Complete an immersive education experience to learn the purpose, objectives, intended audience and structure of five role-based programs: Change Management Practitioner, Change Management Program for Managers, Change Management Sponsor Briefing, Change Management Employee Orientation, and Delivering Project Results Workshop.

Practice teaching select learning modules in front of the class and instructors and receive feedback and recommendations for improving delivery. Craft a training delivery strategy to guide future implementation of change management training.

163a569d-429e-4a4e-98e6-7f68b5c9bab2.description: Les titulaires du badge Prosci® Certified Change Practitioner possèdent les connaissances, les compétences et les outils nécessaires pour mener des initiatives de changement réussies. Ils peuvent appliquer la méthodologie et les outils Prosci pour créer une stratégie et des plans de gestion du changement, avec l'engagement nécessaire pour permettre le changement individuel et obtenir les résultats et les effets organisationnels attendus.
163a569d-429e-4a4e-98e6-7f68b5c9bab2.name: Praticien de changement certifié(e) Prosci®

badge_template_activities.title: Complétez le programme de certification en gestion du changement Prosci de trois jours.
Appliquez des méthodologies et des outils holistiques de gestion du changement à un projet réel.
Compléter avec succès une évaluation compréhensive.

skills.name: Application De La Gestion Du Changement
Appliquer Des Techniques De Changement Éprouvées
Appliquer Le Modèle ADAKR De Prosci

4ef74138-d421-4538-adf8-dbdbf99f4ec8.description: Earners of the Prosci® Fundamentals of Change Management badge have an understanding of the fundamental concepts and organizational benefits of effective change management. They know how to apply five tenets of change management to a specific project or change initiative to build an awareness and desire for change. They can explain the connection between the technical side and people side of change and the value of change management. They can apply the Prosci ADKAR Model for individual change.
4ef74138-d421-4538-adf8-dbdbf99f4ec8.name: Prosci® Fundamentals of Change Management

badge_template_activities.title: Earners attend the one-day Fundamentals of Change Management Workshop which covers the fundamental concepts of change management and establishes how effective change management can benefit their organization.
The program applies five tenets of change management to a specific project or change initiative to build awareness and desire for change management—the first two milestones in the Prosci ADKAR Model.

f09825d1-fa10-4f80-832e-e836e278a1e7.description: Earners of the Prosci® Certified Advanced Instructor badge have the tools they need to train Certified Change Practitioners within their company, plus the authority to use Prosci’s® proven methodologies and resources. Specifically, earners can facilitate Prosci® role-based training, bring industry-leading change management programs into their organization, and provide Prosci® Certification to participants who attend and successfully complete the Prosci® Practitioner programs they instruct.
f09825d1-fa10-4f80-832e-e836e278a1e7.name: Prosci® Certified Advanced Instructor

badge_template_activities.title: Complete six required online and/or in-person training modules including Prosci’s® renowned Train-the-Trainer Program and five elective online change specialist modules.
Choose and perform a minimum of three real-world experience electives, such as publishing an article or giving a speech about change management.
Pass a Prosci® audit of their instruction of the Prosci® Change Management Certification Program as the final capstone project.

6c74fdc8-0426-4a9a-818b-7b3e08930858.description: Earners of the Prosci® Change Management Employee Orientation badge know how to evaluate a current change in their job and use the Prosci® ADKAR® model to identify their points of resistance and create strategies for overcoming their resistance. They can communicate about change in a way that is productive and proactive and they are confident and empowered in the change process.
6c74fdc8-0426-4a9a-818b-7b3e08930858.name: Prosci® Change Management Employee Orientation

badge_template_activities.title: Earners attend a one-day Change Management Employee Orientation workshop where they explore organizational change history, change as a process, and resistance to change.
Badge earners develop an action plan to overcome their own resistance to a change in their job.

2e43451b-d6de-4114-acc9-6802b285e451.description: Advanced Immersion Workshop badge earners know how to apply cutting-edge, research based approaches that deliver exceptional results on complex change. They can create a multi-dimensional Change Scorecard to define, track and measure success and calculate the adoption contribution of project ROI. They know how to use the PCT Analyzer to monitor and improve project health, track and guide individual transitions through change, and align their approach to best practices and Key Success Factors.
2e43451b-d6de-4114-acc9-6802b285e451.name: Prosci® Advanced Immersion Workshop

badge_template_activities.title: Badge earners attend a two-day professional development program that focuses on advanced change management tools and application. They apply cutting-edge, research-based approaches designed to help deliver exceptional results on complex change.

aa000fe5-628a-45dd-affd-94a3333d22cd.description: Experienced Practitioner Program badge earners have an enhanced perspective on how to best adapt change management within their organization to improve change capability and results. They know how to apply change management to teams, integrate change management and project management, engage sponsors and managers, and manage resistance to change. They understand how to resource and budget for change management, measure change, and build enterprise change capability.
aa000fe5-628a-45dd-affd-94a3333d22cd.name: Prosci® Experienced Practitioner Program

badge_template_activities.title: Badge earners attend the intensive three-day Experienced Practitioner Program where they collaborate with and learn from other experienced change management practitioners. They explore the history and evolution of change management, analyze change management models and learn to apply advanced change management tools to build enterprise change capability.
Badge earners complete a comprehensive literature review of twelve important works in change management prior to attending the program.
Badge earners prepare a presentation reviewing and comparing two different approaches to change management

7a6985f8-2cf2-4977-926a-78ccb940f205.description: Earners of the Prosci® Change Management Employee Orientation badge know how to evaluate a current change in their job and use the Prosci® ADKAR® model to identify their points of resistance and create strategies for overcoming their resistance. They can communicate about change in a way that is productive and proactive and they are confident and empowered in the change process.
7a6985f8-2cf2-4977-926a-78ccb940f205.name: Prosci® Change Management Employee Orientation - Delivered by Afrissance

badge_template_activities.title: Earners attend a one-day Change Management Employee Orientation workshop where they explore organizational change history, change as a process, and resistance to change.
Badge earners develop an action plan to overcome their own resistance to a change in their job.

b03cf2b7-529d-41f2-a596-48455eec1f8f.description: Les titulaires du badge Prosci® Mener votre équipe à travers le changement ont les outils, les connaissances et la confiance nécessaires pour mener une équipe à travers le changement organisationnel. Ils peuvent évaluer un changement affectant leur équipe, appliquer le modèle ADKAR® de Prosci pour faciliter le changement individuel, appliquer des outils de gestion du changement et créer des plans pour aider les employés à dépasser les obstacles et atteindre les résultats souhaités.
b03cf2b7-529d-41f2-a596-48455eec1f8f.name: Mener votre équipe à travers le changement par Prosci®

badge_template_activities.title: Terminez l'atelier d'une journée Mener votre équipe à travers le changement.

Appliquer le modèle ADKAR® de Prosci pour faciliter le changement individuel, appliquer des outils de gestion du changement et créer des plans pour aider les employés à dépasser les obstacles et atteindre les résultats souhaités.

skills.name: Appliquer Des Techniques De Changement Éprouvées
Appliquer Le Modèle ADKAR De Prosci

90bec0e7-f3a3-47c1-b7fe-ba512cc07aa9.description: Earners of the Improve Project Health badge learn to use advanced skills, peer insights, and Prosci’s body of knowledge to deliver better project outcomes. They understand how to effectively apply the PCT Model and conduct PCT Assessments to improve project health throughout the project lifecycle. They combine their new skills, lessons learned from their peers, Prosci research findings, and Knowledge Hub guidance and resources to make informed project decisions and elevate their practices.
90bec0e7-f3a3-47c1-b7fe-ba512cc07aa9.name: Prosci® Improve Project Health

badge_template_activities.title: Complete a one day Improve Project Health Program
Explain the why, what, who, when and how for the PCT Model.

skills.name: Apply the PCT Assessments over the project lifecycle
Make choices and recommendations to improve project health

2b37a51a-131d-44a8-a2b5-35d0598a6f62.description: Les titulaires du badge Orientation Des Employés Pour La Gestion Du Changement Par Prosci® savent évaluer un changement en cours dans leur travail et utilisent le modèle ADKAR® de Prosci® pour identifier leurs points de résistance et créer des stratégies pour surmonter leur résistance. Ils peuvent communiquer sur le changement d'une manière productive et proactive et ils sont confiants et responsabilisés dans le processus de changement.
2b37a51a-131d-44a8-a2b5-35d0598a6f62.name: Orientation Des Employés Pour La Gestion Du Changement Par Prosci®

badge_template_activities.title: Les titulaires assistent à un atelier d'orientation des employés pour la gestion du changement d'une journée où ils explorent l'historique du changement organisationnel, le changement en tant que processus et la résistance au changement.
Les titulaires du badge élaborent un plan d'action pour surmonter leur propre résistance à un changement dans leur travail.

skills.name: Application De La Gestion Du Changement
Appliquer Des Techniques De Changement Éprouvées
Appliquer Le Modèle ADAKR De Prosci

7a29f094-c6dd-4be1-91d2-098c317c46d0.description: To receive the Train-the-Trainer Rewards Tier 2 Badge, the badge earner must attend Prosci’s Train-the-Trainer program and successfully teach three (3) standard Prosci programs. They must also collect and submit participant feedback to Prosci per program taught.
7a29f094-c6dd-4be1-91d2-098c317c46d0.name: Prosci® Train-the-Trainer Rewards Tier 2

badge_template_activities.title: Badge earners gain professional experience by delivering Prosci role-based programs internally. They improve the overall change readiness of their organization by elevating their organization's change management mindset, skillset and toolset.

68394964-e014-4499-a766-bcfc3a138444.description: To receive the Train-the-Trainer Rewards Tier 3 Badge, the badge earner must attend Prosci’s Train-the-Trainer program and successfully teach five (5) standard Prosci programs. They must also collect and submit participant feedback to Prosci per program taught.
68394964-e014-4499-a766-bcfc3a138444.name: Prosci® Train-the-Trainer Rewards Tier 3

badge_template_activities.title: Badge earners gain professional experience by delivering Prosci role-based programs internally. They improve the overall change readiness of their organization by elevating their organization's change management mindset, skillset and toolset.

f8bf3893-002e-4ca6-bb42-28b79a957c14.description: To receive the Train-the-Trainer Rewards Tier 4 Badge, the badge earner must attend Prosci’s Train-the-Trainer program and successfully teach ten (10) standard Prosci programs. They must also collect and submit participant feedback to Prosci per program taught.
f8bf3893-002e-4ca6-bb42-28b79a957c14.name: Prosci® Train-the-Trainer Rewards Tier 4

badge_template_activities.title: Badge earners gain professional experience by delivering Prosci role-based programs internally. They improve the overall change readiness of their organization by elevating their organization's change management mindset, skillset and toolset.

1d4bd143-42a0-4225-b83e-5a6abe9af1ea.description: To receive the Train-the-Trainer Rewards Tier 5 Badge, the badge earner must attend Prosci’s Train-the-Trainer program and successfully teach twenty (20) standard Prosci programs. They must also collect and submit participant feedback to Prosci per program taught.
1d4bd143-42a0-4225-b83e-5a6abe9af1ea.name: Prosci® Train-the-Trainer Rewards Tier 5

badge_template_activities.title: Badge earners gain professional experience by delivering Prosci role-based programs internally. They improve the overall change readiness of their organization by elevating their organization's change management mindset, skillset and toolset.

bc960a80-e7ea-45b6-ab3b-4276c7e9608f.description: Earners of the Prosci® Train-the-Trainer Level 1 badge are qualified to establish a world-class change management training program in their organization, improving their organization's change readiness. They are trainers who know how to develop and deliver four of Prosci's role-based training programs: Change Management Program for Managers, Fundamentals of Change Management, Delivering Projects Results Workshop, and Change Management Employee Orientation.
bc960a80-e7ea-45b6-ab3b-4276c7e9608f.name: Prosci® Train-the-Trainer Level 1 - Delivered by MARG

badge_template_activities.title: Complete an immersive education experience to learn the purpose, objectives, intended audience and structure of four of Prosci's role-based programs: Change Management Program for Managers, Fundamentals of Change Management, Delivering Projects Results Workshop, and Change Management Employee Orientation.

Practice teaching select learning modules in front of the class and instructors and receive feedback and recommendations for improving delivery. Craft a training delivery strategy to guide future implementation of change management training.

976f25e4-1bfc-43f9-9d5e-9f7fb3762982.description: Earners of the Certified Advanced Change Practitioner badge are experts in the implementation of organizational change initiatives. They can scale and apply the Prosci Methodology and 5 Tenets of Change Management to a change management initiative, calculate Change Management ROI and use the Project Change Triangle analyzer to evaluate project health. They can conduct a Best Practice Audit to predict success and complete a Change Scorecard to inform change management initiatives and strategies.
976f25e4-1bfc-43f9-9d5e-9f7fb3762982.name: Prosci® Certified Advanced Change Practitioner

badge_template_activities.title: Badge earners must complete both required and elective modules; elective modules are selected from a menu of learning electives.  Each required or elective module includes education (reading and/or instruction), real-world application, and an evaluation.

Throughout the Certified Advanced Change Practitioner program, badge earners are required to apply their learning to a real-world change management implementation. They must demonstrate their ability to apply change management tools, templates, and assessments; analyze and predict change management effectiveness; report on project results; and demonstrate their ability to manage resistance.

Badge earners choose and perform a minimum of three real-world experience electives such as receiving an endorsement, publishing an article related to change management, giving a speech or volunteering at a change management conference or event, or attending a related course.

Prosci® Certified Advanced Change Practitioners must complete a capstone project that describes the project they have been working on throughout the curriculum and includes a description of the problem, solution and results. The capstone project must showcase use of change management tools, templates, assessments and leveraged best practices components.  It must demonstrate that the candidate's change management work positively contributed to a successful project outcome.

5bb2f64c-20f2-40cf-9c2e-fc77e236d0a4.description: Earners of the Prosci® Train-the-Trainer Level 2 badge are qualified to establish a world-class change management training program in their organization. They improve their organization's change readiness by elevating the organization's mindset, toolset and skillset and by developing skilled change practitioners. They are trainers who know how to develop and deliver Prosci's role-based programs including Change Management Practitioner Program and Change Management Sponsor Briefing.
5bb2f64c-20f2-40cf-9c2e-fc77e236d0a4.name: Prosci® Train-the-Trainer Level 2

badge_template_activities.title: Complete an immersive education experience to learn the purpose, objectives, intended audience and structure of two of Prosci's role-based programs: Change Management Practitioner Program and Change Management Sponsor Briefing.

Practice teaching select learning modules in front of the class and instructors and receive feedback and recommendations for improving delivery. Craft a training delivery strategy to guide future implementation of change management training.

4f8a5831-1df6-4834-855b-4e7b21293d3e.description: Earners of the Certified Advanced Deployment Leader badge know how to design, embed and advocate for enterprise change management (ECM). They can conduct a Change Management Maturity Model Audit, create a 3-5 year maturation plan, design an ECM Strategy, and develop a high-level plan to institutionalize change management competencies and capabilities that result in increased organizational change management maturity and increased ROI on company initiatives and strategies.
4f8a5831-1df6-4834-855b-4e7b21293d3e.name: Prosci® Certified Advanced Deployment Leader

badge_template_activities.title: Badge earners must complete both required and elective modules; elective modules are selected from a menu of learning electives. Each required and elective module includes education (reading and/or instruction), real-world application, and an evaluation.

Badge earners are required to apply their learning to a real-world enterprise change management implementation. Application is evaluated by a Prosci Advanced Certification Coach through reflections, reports, presentations, analysis, and written summaries.  The candidate must demonstrate use of the CM Maturity Model, Future Vision Maturity Model, and ECM Strategy Map that showcases meaningful progress was made on increasing the overall change management maturity level of the organization.

Badge earners choose and perform a minimum of three real-world experience electives such as receiving an endorsement, publishing an article related to change management, giving a speech or volunteering at a change management conference or event, or attending a related course.

Certified Advanced Deployment Leaders complete a capstone project in which they articulate their Enterprise Change Management Journey and demonstrate an advanced level of individual competency through the creation of a case study. The case study must describe the Current State, Transition State, and Future State and demonstrate increased organizational maturity as a direct result of their work. The capstone project is reviewed by a cohort member and must be approved by two executive leaders.

370954f0-3f41-446a-bb81-00e46036474f.description: Earners of the Prosci® Train-the-Trainer Level 1 badge are qualified to establish a world-class change management training program in their organization, improving their organization's change readiness. They are trainers who know how to develop and deliver four of Prosci's role-based training programs: Change Management Program for Managers, Fundamentals of Change Management, Delivering Projects Results Workshop, and Change Management Employee Orientation.
370954f0-3f41-446a-bb81-00e46036474f.name: Prosci® Train-the-Trainer Level 1

badge_template_activities.title: Complete an immersive education experience to learn the purpose, objectives, intended audience and structure of four of Prosci's role-based programs: Change Management Program for Managers, Fundamentals of Change Management, Delivering Projects Results Workshop, and Change Management Employee Orientation.

Practice teaching select learning modules in front of the class and instructors and receive feedback and recommendations for improving delivery. Craft a training delivery strategy to guide future implementation of change management training.

2b8f898a-e61d-4db0-8c55-bd4f9ca5f80b.description: Les titulaires du badge Prendre en main le changement par Prosci® peuvent appliquer cinq principes de gestion du changement à une initiative de changement spécifique pour renforcer la sensibilisation et le désir de gestion du changement - les deux premiers jalons du modèle ADKAR de Prosci. Ils comprennent la valeur de la gestion du changement et le lien entre les aspects techniques et humains du changement. Ils savent comment évaluer une initiative de changement et appliquer le modèle ADKAR.
2b8f898a-e61d-4db0-8c55-bd4f9ca5f80b.name: Prendre en main le changement par Prosci®

badge_template_activities.title: Terminez l'atelier d'une journée Prendre en main le changement

Appliquer les cinq principes du changement à une initiative en effectuant un diagnostic et une évaluation de l'initiative, en appliquant le modèle ADKAR pour le changement individuel et en élaborant un plan d'engagement à l'action.

skills.name: Application De La Gestion Du Changement
Appliquer Des Techniques De Changement Éprouvées
Appliquer Le Modèle ADKAR De Prosci

eba0b99a-b44b-41a0-b5bc-d64fbb9f11c7.description: Earners of the Prosci® Enterprise Change Management (ECM) Boot Camp can assess their organization's change management maturity across five capability areas and define a future state vision for change capability. They understand how the people side of change relates to building capability and they know best practices when applying enterprise change management. They can create an ECM strategy map and lead a change management deployment that drives competitive advantage.
eba0b99a-b44b-41a0-b5bc-d64fbb9f11c7.name: Prosci® Enterprise Change Management Boot Camp

badge_template_activities.title: Complete the one-day Enterprise Change Management Boot Camp.
Create an enterprise change management strategy map.

f0408d6d-4c1d-4b30-8adb-dfc78fdbf576.description: Earners of the Methodology Application Program badge know how to apply Prosci's enhanced methodology and advanced digital tools. They can assess holistic project health, evaluate a broad range of risk, and develop a role roster to identify and activate change management roles. They know how to align people-side activities and timelines to a project, build and activate an ADKAR Blueprint, and adapt change management plans. They can use Proxima, Prosci's digital tool for managing change.
f0408d6d-4c1d-4b30-8adb-dfc78fdbf576.name: Prosci® Methodology Application Program

badge_template_activities.title: Badge earners attend a one-day program where they learn to apply Prosci's enhanced methodology and use Prosci's advanced digital tools to achieve successful change outcomes.

73e10f7e-5a7a-41fc-ba83-372f55c146c5.description: Earners of the Prosci® VILT Train-the-Trainer badge are qualified to establish a world-class change management training program in their organization. They are expert trainers who know how to develop and deliver Prosci's core training programs: Change Management Program for Managers, Fundamentals of Change Management, Delivering Projects Results Workshop, Change Management Employee Orientation, Change Management Practitioner Program, and Change Management Sponsor Briefing.
73e10f7e-5a7a-41fc-ba83-372f55c146c5.name: Prosci® VILT Train-the-Trainer

badge_template_activities.title: Complete an immersive education experience to learn the purpose, objectives, intended audience and structure of Prosci's role-based programs: Change Management Program for Managers, Fundamentals of Change Management, Delivering Projects Results Workshop, Change Management Employee Orientation, Change Management Practitioner Program, and Change Management Sponsor Briefing.

Practice teaching select learning modules in front of the class and instructors and receive feedback and recommendations for improving delivery. Craft a training delivery strategy to guide future implementation of change management training.

d365f524-ef3c-43fc-aa05-51a45374863f.description: Les titulaires du badge Atelier sur la réalisation des résultats des projets par Prosci® augmentent le retour sur investissement du projet en sachant comment intégrer la gestion de projet et la gestion du changement. Ils ont un cadre de changement commun avec les praticiens de la gestion du changement et peuvent relier la gestion du changement à leurs projets à l'aide du plan de gestion du changement Prosci®. Ils comprennent le lien entre l'adoption par les employés et les résultats du projet.
d365f524-ef3c-43fc-aa05-51a45374863f.name: Atelier sur la réalisation des résultats des projets par Prosci®

badge_template_activities.title: Les titulaires du badge doivent suivre l'atelier sur la réalisation des résultats des projets, une expérience d'apprentissage axée sur les résultats pour les chefs de projet et les membres de l'équipe de projet qui définit la gestion du changement dans le contexte de l'intention, des objectifs, de la portée, des flux de travail, des jalons, des livrables et des délais du projet. L'atelier fournit un langage et un cadre communs pour intégrer la gestion de projet et la gestion du changement.

skills.name: Application De La Gestion Du Changement
Appliquer Des Techniques De Changement Éprouvées
Appliquer Le Modèle ADAKR De Prosci

1e63bc92-6ebb-48bd-8876-838b07df701f.description: Les titulaires du badge Introduction pour les sponsors à la gestion du changement par Prosci® apprécient le lien entre la gestion du changement et les résultats d’affaire. Ils comprennent le processus en trois phases de Prosci et le modèle ADKAR® et savent comment positionner les sponsors, les projets et leur organisation pour la réussite du changement. Ils peuvent évaluer les riques présent dans leur portefeuille de changements et assurer des ressources adéquates pour la gestion du changement.
1e63bc92-6ebb-48bd-8876-838b07df701f.name: Introduction Pour Les Sponsors À La Gestion Du Changement Par Prosci®

badge_template_activities.title: Les titulaires du badge participent à un programme éducatif qui fournit aux cadres supérieurs les connaissances et la capacité d'améliorer les résultats du changement.

skills.name: Application De La Gestion Du Changement
Appliquer Des Techniques De Changement Éprouvées
Appliquer Le Modèle ADKAR De Prosci

882a688d-8223-43b9-b39b-cfb61d68c19b.description: Advanced Immersion Workshop badge earners know how to apply cutting-edge, research based approaches that deliver exceptional results on complex change. They can create a multi-dimensional Change Scorecard to define, track and measure success and calculate the adoption contribution of project ROI. They know how to use the PCT Analyzer to monitor and improve project health, track and guide individual transitions through change, and align their approach to best practices and Key Success Factors.
882a688d-8223-43b9-b39b-cfb61d68c19b.name: Prosci® Advanced Immersion Workshop

badge_template_activities.title: Badge earners attend a two-day professional development program that focuses on advanced change management tools and application. They apply cutting-edge, research-based approaches designed to help deliver exceptional results on complex change.

9b74d309-9dea-4bff-981c-49a273250ac4.description: Earners of the Certified Advanced Change Practitioner badge are experts in the implementation of organizational change initiatives. They can scale and apply the Prosci Methodology and 5 Tenets of Change Management to a change management initiative, calculate Change Management ROI and use the Project Change Triangle analyzer to evaluate project health. They can conduct a Best Practice Audit to predict success and complete a Change Scorecard to inform change management initiatives and strategies.
9b74d309-9dea-4bff-981c-49a273250ac4.name: Prosci® Certified Advanced Change Practitioner

badge_template_activities.title: Badge earners must complete both required and elective modules; elective modules are selected from a menu of learning electives.  Each required or elective module includes education (reading and/or instruction), real-world application, and an evaluation.

Throughout the Certified Advanced Change Practitioner program, badge earners are required to apply their learning to a real-world change management implementation. They must demonstrate their ability to apply change management tools, templates, and assessments; analyze and predict change management effectiveness; report on project results; and demonstrate their ability to manage resistance.

Badge earners choose and perform a minimum of three real-world experience electives such as receiving an endorsement, publishing an article related to change management, giving a speech or volunteering at a change management conference or event, or attending a related course.

Prosci® Certified Advanced Change Practitioners must complete a capstone project that describes the project they have been working on throughout the curriculum and includes a description of the problem, solution and results. The capstone project must showcase use of change management tools, templates, assessments and leveraged best practices components.  It must demonstrate that the candidate's change management work positively contributed to a successful project outcome.

2e132484-571b-469d-a67b-cd1b357c891b.description: Earners of the Certified Advanced Deployment Leader badge know how to design, embed and advocate for enterprise change management (ECM). They can conduct a Change Management Maturity Model Audit, create a 3-5 year maturation plan, design an ECM Strategy, and develop a high-level plan to institutionalize change management competencies and capabilities that result in increased organizational change management maturity and increased ROI on company initiatives and strategies.
2e132484-571b-469d-a67b-cd1b357c891b.name: Prosci® Certified Advanced Deployment Leader

badge_template_activities.title: Badge earners must complete both required and elective modules; elective modules are selected from a menu of learning electives. Each required and elective module includes education (reading and/or instruction), real-world application, and an evaluation.

Badge earners are required to apply their learning to a real-world enterprise change management implementation. Application is evaluated by a Prosci Advanced Certification Coach through reflections, reports, presentations, analysis, and written summaries.  The candidate must demonstrate use of the CM Maturity Model, Future Vision Maturity Model, and ECM Strategy Map that showcases meaningful progress was made on increasing the overall change management maturity level of the organization.

Badge earners choose and perform a minimum of three real-world experience electives such as receiving an endorsement, publishing an article related to change management, giving a speech or volunteering at a change management conference or event, or attending a related course.

Certified Advanced Deployment Leaders complete a capstone project in which they articulate their Enterprise Change Management Journey and demonstrate an advanced level of individual competency through the creation of a case study. The case study must describe the Current State, Transition State, and Future State and demonstrate increased organizational maturity as a direct result of their work. The capstone project is reviewed by a cohort member and must be approved by two executive leaders.

875aa7b5-4017-43ad-a882-2187ab933432.description: Earners of the Prosci® Certified Advanced Instructor badge have the tools they need to train Certified Change Practitioners within their company, plus the authority to use Prosci’s® proven methodologies and resources. Specifically, earners can facilitate Prosci® role-based training, bring industry-leading change management programs into their organization, and provide Prosci® Certification to participants who attend and successfully complete the Prosci® Practitioner programs they instruct.
875aa7b5-4017-43ad-a882-2187ab933432.name: Prosci® Certified Advanced Instructor

badge_template_activities.title: Complete six required online and/or in-person training modules including Prosci’s® renowned Train-the-Trainer Program and five elective online change specialist modules.
Choose and perform a minimum of three real-world experience electives, such as publishing an article or giving a speech about change management.
Pass a Prosci® audit of their instruction of the Prosci® Change Management Certification Program as the final capstone project.

79681283-4ad4-4c72-823e-993c06256d4f.description: Earners of the Prosci® Change Management Employee Orientation badge know how to evaluate a current change in their job and use the Prosci® ADKAR® model to identify their points of resistance and create strategies for overcoming their resistance. They can communicate about change in a way that is productive and proactive and they are confident and empowered in the change process.
79681283-4ad4-4c72-823e-993c06256d4f.name: Prosci® Change Management Employee Orientation - Delivered by ProClipse Consulting

badge_template_activities.title: Earners attend a one-day Change Management Employee Orientation workshop where they explore organizational change history, change as a process, and resistance to change.
Badge earners develop an action plan to overcome their own resistance to a change in their job.

a27aa38b-fc0e-40b3-bfc8-516c5b78f470.description: Experienced Practitioner Program badge earners have an enhanced perspective on how to best adapt change management within their organization to improve change capability and results. They know how to apply change management to teams, integrate change management and project management, engage sponsors and managers, and manage resistance to change. They understand how to resource and budget for change management, measure change, and build enterprise change capability.
a27aa38b-fc0e-40b3-bfc8-516c5b78f470.name: Prosci® Experienced Practitioner Program

badge_template_activities.title: Badge earners attend the intensive three-day Experienced Practitioner Program where they collaborate with and learn from other experienced change management practitioners. They explore the history and evolution of change management, analyze change management models and learn to apply advanced change management tools to build enterprise change capability.
Badge earners complete a comprehensive literature review of twelve important works in change management prior to attending the program.
Badge earners prepare a presentation reviewing and comparing two different approaches to change management

6a28575a-5149-4bec-972c-50cd5dcbeef7.description: Earners of the Prosci® Fundamentals of Change Management badge have an understanding of the fundamental concepts and organizational benefits of effective change management. They know how to apply five tenets of change management to a specific project or change initiative to build an awareness and desire for change. They can explain the connection between the technical side and people side of change and the value of change management. They can apply the Prosci ADKAR Model for individual change.
6a28575a-5149-4bec-972c-50cd5dcbeef7.name: Prosci® Fundamentals of Change Management

badge_template_activities.title: Earners attend the one-day Fundamentals of Change Management Workshop which covers the fundamental concepts of change management and establishes how effective change management can benefit their organization.
The program applies five tenets of change management to a specific project or change initiative to build awareness and desire for change management—the first two milestones in the Prosci ADKAR Model.

1f5304c7-a6dd-401f-bbdd-a478215f5bb6.description: Earners of the Integrating Agile and Change Management badge understand how to leverage change management while migrating to an Agile framework and how combining change management and Agile can improve the adoption and usage of iteratively designed solutions. They can adapt their change management approach and align the ADKAR® Model with Agile efforts and sprints/releases. They know how to align the five organizational change management plans to Agile and identify specific adjustments for each.
1f5304c7-a6dd-401f-bbdd-a478215f5bb6.name: Prosci® Integrating Agile and Change Management

badge_template_activities.title: Complete the one-day Integrating Agile and Change Management Workshop.
Build detailed tactics and plans for adapting change management for an Agile iterative development initiative.

0f4cd444-4e17-4b1a-8d0e-b2b5e275957e.description: Earners of the Prosci® Train-the-Trainer Level 2 badge are qualified to establish a world-class change management training program in their organization. They improve their organization's change readiness by elevating the organization's mindset, toolset and skillset and by developing skilled change practitioners. They are trainers who know how to develop and deliver Prosci's role-based programs including Change Management Practitioner Program and Change Management Sponsor Briefing.
0f4cd444-4e17-4b1a-8d0e-b2b5e275957e.name: Prosci® Train-the-Trainer Level 2 - Delivered by MARG

badge_template_activities.title: Complete an immersive education experience to learn the purpose, objectives, intended audience and structure of two of Prosci's role-based programs: Change Management Practitioner Program and Change Management Sponsor Briefing.

Practice teaching select learning modules in front of the class and instructors and receive feedback and recommendations for improving delivery. Craft a training delivery strategy to guide future implementation of change management training.

6b160caa-80d1-4f2f-a423-7c7b2041e849.description: To receive the Train-the-Trainer Rewards Tier 1 Badge, the badge earner must attend Prosci’s Train-the-Trainer program and successfully teach one standard Prosci program. They must also collect and submit participant feedback to Prosci.
6b160caa-80d1-4f2f-a423-7c7b2041e849.name: Prosci® Train-the-Trainer Rewards Tier 1

badge_template_activities.title: Badge earners gain professional experience by delivering a Prosci role-based program internally. They improve the overall change readiness of their organization by elevating their organization's change management mindset, skillset and toolset.

75c31da7-eb2c-4193-bb5c-40c61aafa157.description: To receive the Train-the-Trainer Rewards Tier 2 Badge, the badge earner must attend Prosci’s Train-the-Trainer program and successfully teach three (3) standard Prosci programs. They must also collect and submit participant feedback to Prosci per program taught.
75c31da7-eb2c-4193-bb5c-40c61aafa157.name: Prosci® Train-the-Trainer Rewards Tier 2

badge_template_activities.title: Badge earners gain professional experience by delivering Prosci role-based programs internally. They improve the overall change readiness of their organization by elevating their organization's change management mindset, skillset and toolset.

e30dee17-878b-4c6c-b8b9-6102ec8987a8.description: To receive the Train-the-Trainer Rewards Tier 3 Badge, the badge earner must attend Prosci’s Train-the-Trainer program and successfully teach five (5) standard Prosci programs. They must also collect and submit participant feedback to Prosci per program taught.
e30dee17-878b-4c6c-b8b9-6102ec8987a8.name: Prosci® Train-the-Trainer Rewards Tier 3

badge_template_activities.title: Badge earners gain professional experience by delivering Prosci role-based programs internally. They improve the overall change readiness of their organization by elevating their organization's change management mindset, skillset and toolset.

ebdd5bb5-ad34-4e9d-9b47-e5794efb3deb.description: To receive the Train-the-Trainer Rewards Tier 4 Badge, the badge earner must attend Prosci’s Train-the-Trainer program and successfully teach ten (10) standard Prosci programs. They must also collect and submit participant feedback to Prosci per program taught.
ebdd5bb5-ad34-4e9d-9b47-e5794efb3deb.name: Prosci® Train-the-Trainer Rewards Tier 4

badge_template_activities.title: Badge earners gain professional experience by delivering Prosci role-based programs internally. They improve the overall change readiness of their organization by elevating their organization's change management mindset, skillset and toolset.

93186237-5842-46a0-aecc-2b8b6dc39081.description: To receive the Train-the-Trainer Rewards Tier 5 Badge, the badge earner must attend Prosci’s Train-the-Trainer program and successfully teach twenty (20) standard Prosci programs. They must also collect and submit participant feedback to Prosci per program taught.
93186237-5842-46a0-aecc-2b8b6dc39081.name: Prosci® Train-the-Trainer Rewards Tier 5

badge_template_activities.title: Badge earners gain professional experience by delivering Prosci role-based programs internally. They improve the overall change readiness of their organization by elevating their organization's change management mindset, skillset and toolset.
